FSA

Class FSA

  • java.lang.Object
    • FSA.FSA
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CA, FMA, PFSA

    public class FSA
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class represents a FSA.
    Author:
    Davide Basile
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
